official_title: A bill to authorize the appropriation of funds for the Benjamin Franklin National Memorial.

summary.text: Authorizes appropriations to the Secretary of the Interior to assist the Franklin Institute of Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, in renovating, maintaining, and operating the Benjamin Franklin National Memorial.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the appropriation of funds for the Benjamin Franklin National Memorial.
